entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain near midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
